name: DD4C Lasting Power Attorney Code
description: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Personal welfare lasting power of attorney findings' subset with subset original id 47771000000138; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Personal welfare lasting power of attorney findings simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999001951000000107
